body:
Comment 8: 
It could be related.  It looks like some of the files in test
are not as they should be for release.r57.2.  Could you
try removing your Go directory (or moving it out of the way)
and checking it out again with

hg clone -u release.r57.2 https://go.googlecode.com/hg .../go

Thanks.
Russ
